title: Tons of packet loss.  Still no response.
body: Many people have posted this and also posted their network logs to no avail.  I don't get packet loss connecting to any other IP, running tracert, etc.  This is getting frustrating.

replies.body:
Packet loss is something you're most likely not going to be able to replicate for any server you do a traceroute to. Essentially what's happening is your network or ISP is possibly sending your connection through a less-than-optimal route to our servers. 

Since you already know you're having packet loss issues, let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can see where exactly that loss is happening, and if there's anything we can do to clear that up.
